What are the symptoms of Adult-onset vitelliform macular dystrophy ?,"What are the signs and symptoms of Adult-onset vitelliform macular dystrophy? Signs and symptoms of adult-onset vitelliform macular dystrophy typically begin during mid-adulthood,
